source.oracleReaderQuery:
WITH FirstQuery AS (
    SELECT 
        tag_no 
    FROM (
        SELECT   
            tag_no  
        FROM scm_admin.view_bpc_print_tag 
        MINUS
        SELECT   
            tag_no  
        FROM scm_admin.esb_bpc_print_tag
    )
    WHERE rownum <= 1000
)
SELECT
    NVL(TRIM(MODIFY_DATE), ' ') AS MODIFY_DATE,
    NVL(TRIM(CREATE_DATE), ' ') AS CREATE_DATE,
    NVL(TRIM(SO_ITEM_NO), ' ') AS SO_ITEM_NO,
    NVL(TRIM(BBS_NO), ' ') AS BBS_NO,
    NVL(TRIM(PLANNEDDATEANDSHIFT), ' ') AS PLANNEDDATEANDSHIFT,
    NVL(TRIM(DRAWING_NO), ' ') AS DRAWING_NO,
    NVL(TRIM(DRAWING_REVISION), ' ') AS DRAWING_REVISION,
    NVL(TRIM(DELIVERY_DATE), ' ') AS DELIVERY_DATE,
    NVL(SUBSTR(TRIM(CAGE_NAME), 0, 11), ' ') AS CAGE_NAME,
    NVL(TRIM(SO_NO), ' ') AS SO_NO,
    NVL(TRIM(FSQ.TAG_NO), ' ') AS TAG_NO,
    NVL(TRIM(WORK_CENTER), ' ') AS WORK_CENTER,
    NVL(TRIM(TEMPLATE), ' ') AS TEMPLATE,
    NVL(TRIM(PROJ_NAME), ' ') AS PROJ_NAME,
    NVL(TRIM(CUST_NAME), ' ') AS CUST_NAME,
    NVL(TRIM(PILE_SEQ_NO), ' ') AS PILE_SEQ_NO,
    NVL(TRIM(PRODN_MARKING_REV_NO), ' ') AS PRODN_MARKING_REV_NO,
    NVL(TRIM(RUNNING_CNTR), ' ') AS RUNNING_CNTR,
    NVL(PRODN_SEQ, 0) AS PRODN_SEQ,
    NVL(TRIM(PRODN_MARKING), ' ') AS PRODN_MARKING,
    NVL(TRIM(FLD_PSCH_REC_TYPE_OBSOLETE), ' ') AS FLD_PSCH_REC_TYPE_OBSOLETE,
    NVL(TRIM(Q_PO_NO), ' ') AS Q_PO_NO,
    NVL(TRIM(RELEASE_CODE), ' ') AS RELEASE_CODE,
    NVL(TRIM(LOAD_NO), ' ') AS LOAD_NO,
    NVL(REC_ID, 0) AS REC_ID,
    NVL(URGENT_ORDER_IND, ' ') AS URGENT_ORDER_IND,
    NVL(CONQUAS_IND, ' ') AS CONQUAS_IND
FROM 
    scm_admin.view_bpc_print_tag FSQ
JOIN 
    FirstQuery FQ ON FSQ.TAG_NO = FQ.TAG_NO
WHERE 
    ROWNUM <= 5;
